response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item holds significant value for us at $12,000, reflecting its quality and uniqueness. Considering its worth to you is $8,000, I propose a fair deal that benefits both parties. Let's make it happen for $9,500. This offer combines a reasonable profit margin for us with an attractive price for you, ensuring a win-win situation. Please let me know if this proposal meets your expectations.", "product_price": 9500}
